# [Interview #580: Paris Signing Report - Jonathan B, Entry #18](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=580#18)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Julien also asked what
*Shanna'har*
meant and [Brandon] said that he had asked Alan for a word that meant "commemoration" in the Old Tongue.
